title: GORGEOUS 5/4 HOME IN A FANTASTIC LOCATION, WAITING FOR YOU!
posting_body: Gorgeous architecturally-designed two-story home oozing with sophistication and elegance beckons one inside to an open concept layout that brilliantly maximizes space and natural light!

Step in and be wowed by the stunning hardwood floors and sophisticated finishes, where every minute detail have been well thought-out—from the cantilever stairs, to the strategically-placed skylights, to that remarkable chandelier over the dining table that softens the many crisp angles in the space.

Our kitchen will definitely delight the chef of the home, with its top-of-the line stainless steel appliances including a French-door refrigerator, professional built-in double oven, an expensive built-in induction cooktop with vented hood, dishwasher, garbage disposal, plus a wine fridge in the bar!
Kitchen cabinets are streamlined and come in white and natural wood with black accents.
Sleek pendant lights illuminate the large island and its glossy white marble countertop!
The main level is enclosed by a fabulous NanaWall glass wall that folds up to instantly connect the room with your beautifully landscaped backyard!
The entire yard is fully-fenced with lavish hardwood for complete privacy!
The flooring of the deck gracefully simulates a parquet floor and provides a compelling layer of texture to the yard.
There is a bonus room on the lower floor serving as an ideal office or bedroom, and one bath on the main level.
The upper floor has four bedrooms plus and three baths on the upper floor.
A formal-meets-comfort aesthetic is on full display in the master bath with its glamorous freestanding bathtub!
Clean lines, marble walls, and an LED-lighted mirror enhance the bathroom's modern style.
This charming abode comes with a garage for two cars and in-unit laundry for your convenience.
It’s peacefully nestled in a family-friendly neighborhood, nearby great restaurants and hotspots along Geary and Clement Streets, and walking distance to the Golden Gate and the Presidio!
This home is such an epitome of a modern masterpiece that it was featured in HGTV Magazine for being a state-of-the-art San Francisco townhouse!
Lease Term: 12 months
Deposit Amount: One month's rent
Pet Deposit: $500
Included In Rent:
Gas
Parking
HOME ID: 7aeea7fa7e16f442
